'Gruppen' () for three orchestras (1955–57) is amongst the best-known
compositions of German composer Karlheinz Stockhausen, and is Work Number 6 in
the composer's catalog of works. Gruppen is "a landmark in 20th-century music .
. . probably the first work of the post-war generation of composers in which
technique and imagination combine on the highest level to produce an
undisputable masterpiece" (Smalley 1967, 794).
wiki.title: Gruppen%20%28Stockhausen%29
